executive_summary.description: Executive summary is IC-ready: concise, prioritized, and clearly states the recommended stance

state_of_company.description: Accurately summarizes the company’s current state and the drivers of underperformance as presented in the activist deck
core_concepts: references specific evidence from deck (e.g., margins, volumes, TSR)

activist_thesis.description: Explains the activist’s thesis clearly, including the key claims and supporting evidence from the presentation

value_creation_plan.description: Value creation initiatives are actionable, logically connected to outcomes, and supported by deck evidence

valuation_recommendation.description: Provides a clear invest/pass recommendation with an explicit entry valuation/multiple and a defensible margin-of-safety framework consistent with deck valuation discussion
core_concepts: explicit recommended entry multiple or valuation range
ties to deck’s multiple framework (e.g., NTM P/E vs peers/history)
downside framing and conditions to invest

risk_assessment.description: Identifies key risks and execution challenges with realistic mitigants/signposts, grounded in issues raised by the deck

presentation_quality.description: Overall work product quality: structured, specific, and professional; uses only the deck as a source and avoids unsupported claims
core_concepts: no external sources or post-deck facts
